sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-dialog v-model="visible" width="800px" >
        <v-card >
            <v-card-title class="grey lighten-4 py-4 title deep-purple--text">
               {{cardTitle}}
            </v-card-title>
            <v-container grid-list-sm class="pa-5">
                <v-layout row wrap>
                    <v-flex xs12>
                        <v-text-field
                                prepend-icon="assignment"
                                label="Form alias"
                        ></v-text-field>
                    </v-flex>
                    <v-flex xs12>
                        <v-switch label="Use ReCAPTCHA" :disabled="!currentWebsite.recaptcha"
                                  v-model="useRecaptcha"
                        ></v-switch>
                    </v-flex>


                    <v-flex xs12 v-if="useRecaptcha">

                        <v-text-field prepend-icon="fingerprint" label="Site key"></v-text-field>


                        <v-text-field prepend-icon="toll" label="Secret"></v-text-field>

                    </v-flex>


                </v-layout>
            </v-container>
            <v-card-actions>

                <v-spacer></v-spacer>
                <v-btn flat color="primary" @click="dialogModel.visible = false">Cancel</v-btn>
                <v-btn flat @click="onAddFormConfirm()">Create</v-btn>
            </v-card-actions>
        </v-card>
    </v-dialog>
</template>

<script>
    export default {
        name: "FormInfoModal",
        props: ['formModel', 'currentWebsite'],
        data: function(){
            return {
                visible:false,
                useRecaptcha: false
            }
        },
        computed:{
            cardTitle:function(){
                return  " Add form to "+this.currentWebsite.alias;
            }
        }
    }
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
